DIY Website

A Website in Seconds!

Pagevamp is the easiest and fastest way for you to create a professional website that amplifies your presence online and drives your business. Get a website built for you in seconds! Pagevamp connects with your Facebook Page to pull all of your information (like photos and videos) and automatically builds a beautiful website in seconds—no technical skills required!

Your new website is synced with your Facebook Page, so all news posts, events, and photos posted to you Facebook page will be updated automatically on your Pagevamp website. You can customize the look, feel, and content of your website using a simple, user-friendly editor.

To see how your website can turn out, take a look at this Example!

  • Automatic Updates: Your new website is synced with your Facebook Page, so all your Facebook news posts, events, and photos will be updated automatically on your Pagevamp website.
  • Improve Visibility Online: Pagevamp websites perform better than Facebook Pages (and other social pages) in search results because Google gives preference to websites published on a custom domain.
  • Market to Non-Facebook User: Only Facebook users can engage with your Facebook Page. Having a website allows you to pitch your business and be contacted by 100% of internet users, even non-Facebook users.
  • Customization: You can customize the look, feel, and content of your website using a simple, user-friendly editor.
  • Sell Better: Visitors who land on your business’s Pagevamp website are more likely to take action than if they land on your business’s Facebook Page.
  • Launch your website in minutes: Pagevamp is able to create the initial version of your website in seconds using your Facebook Page content. Just customize the site to your needs, and launch!
  • Everything you need is included: .COM domain, hosting, newsletter, e-commerce, and analytics
  • We are website experts: Over 15,000 small businesses have built their websites with Pagevamp. You're in good company.

FAQ

Does I need to have a Facebook Page to build a website with Pagevamp?
Yes. Pagevamp will use your Business Facebook Page for initial site creation and regular updates.
If I already own a domain, can it be used for my Pagevamp website?
A domain name is like a street address, but for the Internet. A domain name is letters and numbers followed by an ending like (.com) or (.ca). It is also the URL customers enter to find your website.

Upgrades

DIWM Website

Gallery

Domain

A Domain Name, such as www.MyBusinessName.com, is the web address to your site, which is essential for branding and being found on search engines.

  • Adds credibility to your business.
  • Improves website ranking in search engines for relevant searches.
  • Makes your website address easily accessible and memorable for customers.

FAQ

I've purchased a domain add-on. How do I use it to register a domain name for my Pagevamp website?
  1. Access Pagevamp's editor from your dashboard.
  2. Once you’re in the editor, go to the “Settings” tab.
  3. Click on “Custom URL”, search a domain name you want to register, and if it is available, click on “Available” to register your domain name. Your Pagevamp website will be displayed on your registered domain name within one hour.
If I already own a domain, can it be used for my Pagevamp website?
A domain name is like a street address, but for the Internet. A domain name is letters and numbers followed by an ending like (.com) or (.ca). It is also the URL customers enter to find your website.
